item.title: Support Human Writers And Artists, Buy Our New Print (Or Shirt!)
item.content:encoded:
Published: November 12, 2025, 2:01 pm

Last updated: November 12, 2025, 7:19 pm

We're proud and incredibly excited to announce some new Aftermath merch: a collaboration with artist Simon Hintermann, aka Aurumek, on a new piece called 'Printe Shoppe', which is available now on our store.

It depicts Aftermath working as we'd all presumably like to spend our days: not hunched over computers, which are inherently evil, but relaxing in our quaint countryside office, blue sky overhead, each letter of each blog being slotted purposefully into a printing press by hand. Thoughtful work, human work.

The art is available as both a print and a premium unisex t-shirt (available in 'naturalâ€™ and 'black' colourways). I've got the print framed in my living room and it looks amazing, and all proceeds are split between all humans involved.

You can buy both (and all our other merch, from hoodies to mugs to our 'Destroy AI' tee) at the Aftermath store.

(Also: subscribers to our Member and Benefactor tiers get a discount at our merch store. Keep a lookout for yours in your inbox!)



https://aftermath.site/aurumek-simon-hintermann-new-shirt-print-design-aftermath/
